name: CITY OF YUCAIPA, CA
sampleDescriptions: Fiscal Year 2022 Appropriations legislation and Surface Transportation Reauthorization Legislation
Fiscal Year 2022 Appropriations legislation and Surface Transportation Reauthorization Legislation
H.R.____/S.____ Surface Transportation Authorization Legislation, all provisions related to local transportation priorities.

H.R.1319 American Rescue Plan Act of 2021, Title IX, all provisions related to the Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds.

H.R.3684, INVEST in America Act, Division A, all provisions related to member designated project authorizations.
